list.name: Nina
list.text: Neml, you look so comfortable sleeping.

list.name: Nina
list.text: I wonder what kind of dream you're having.

list.name: Nina
list.text: Hey Neml, I ended up having to go out.

list.name: Nina
list.text: I don't want to wake you, so I'll leave a letter.
Neml picked up the letter on the table.
Neml carefully put away the letter after reading it.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I wonder what happened all of a sudden.
Knocking sounds from the ill-fitting front door.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: I hear you're watching the house?

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Nina asked me to check on you.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I always wait alone when Nina goes shopping.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
Maybe it's not just shopping.
She said she didn't know when she'd be back.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: You didn't ask where she's going?

list.name: Rybel
list.text: I'll take a nap and head out.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.name: Rybel
list.text: At least clean up a bit.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Maybe when I feel like it.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付ける

list.name: Neml
list.text: Maybe I'll tidy up the room.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.text: From nearby come the sounds of breaking glass and loud crashes.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
What is it?
You had to go and wake me.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: If it's about the moon looking bigger lately, I'm tired of hearing it.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
No, that's not it.
Something might have happened at a nearby house.
Rybel peered out the window and watched for a while.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: You've got to be kidding me.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Neml, sorry, but I'm going to hide.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
You probably don't have much to take, but
if you don't want trouble, hide somewhere.
The flimsy front door was slammed by something heavy, shaking the whole room.
Rybel leapt up into the attic and vanished.

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: Doesn't look like there's anything here.

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: If you don't want the place trashed, hand it over yourself.
The man took all the coins from the drawer Neml pointed to.

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: How do you even live with this?

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: Save more before I come back.

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: Someone like you will die on your own anyway.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: As for you, I'll kill you before I leave.
The man approached Neml with a heavy cutlass in one hand.

list.name: Neml
list.text: {red}(What do I do......! Something I can use as a weapon......!)

list.if: ウルフリックに無抵抗

list.text: Neml was helplessly slashed apart by Wulfric's blow.

list.if: ウルフリックにナイフで抵抗

list.text: Neml took a knife from under the bed.
But Wulfric effortlessly kicked the knife away, and it skittered across the floor.
Facing Wulfric raising his cutlass, Neml braced for death.
Rybel jumped down from the attic and drove the knife he'd picked up deep into Wulfric's back.

Wulfric moved his mouth to say something with a furious look,
but a voiceless cough escaped and he collapsed dead.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Let's hide the body before the others find it.
The two finished burying Wulfric's body behind Neml's house.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: We should bury it farther and deeper, but for now it's too dangerous to do more.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付ける
悪夢予防薬を片付けない
悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Now I'm saddled with a serious crime.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付ける

list.name: Neml
list.text: It was mean to hide by yourself.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Unlike you with nothing to your name, if I got found it would've been bad in a lot of ways.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: But it turned out fine, so it's fine.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Hey, that person earlier wasn't Tormenian, right?

list.name: Neml
list.text: Their skin was blue and their ears were round.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
There aren't many Chaotix,
but they base themselves near the mountains and do bandit-like stuff.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: First time I've seen them in a district full of shacks like this, though.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: I know that guy from earlier.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: He's called Wulfric, one of their leaders.

list.name: Neml
list.text: It's my first time seeing a race other than Tormenian.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Yeah, but we look the same......

list.name: Neml
list.text: Is Nina going to live in your mansion someday?

list.name: Neml
list.text: Because you just said Nina is beautiful.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: How does that lead to that?

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Don't just say, "I wouldn't like that."

list.name: Rybel
list.text: If people found out I married a Noctarian, my family would be finished.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Do you really understand how the world treats you?

list.name: Rybel
list.text: That's why you live quietly pretending to be Tormenian, right?

list.name: Rybel
list.text: I don't remember becoming cruel enough to steal Nina from you.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I'd be in trouble without Nina.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: You can't just rely on her help.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Well, if that's fine with you two, fine.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Hey, is it safe outside now?

list.name: Neml
list.text: I need to go to the apothecary.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: If you're heading out, grab some food at the market while you're at it.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: You really don't look happy about it.

list.if: 荷物なし
荷物あり
身分を証明できる
ボロがカスラの実を吐き出す

list.name: Neml
list.text: It's been so long since I've been to the market.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Which shop does Nina usually buy from......?

list.name: Lady
list.text: the one who lives with Nina.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Um, from the house across the way......
Good evening.

list.name: Lady
list.text: It's rare to see you today.

list.name: Lady
list.text: You know, I only ever see Nina at the market.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Oh, um, Nina had to go out suddenly.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Which shop does Nina usually shop at?

list.name: Lady
list.text: Ah, yes, she often shopped at that stall over there.

list.name: Lady
list.text: You know, the one with Bolo.

list.name: Lady
list.text: The brown dog sitting nicely in front of that shop.

list.name: Lady
list.text: Nina always gave Bolo bread scraps, so I'm sure.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I should line up behind that person.

list.name: Trader
list.text: Are you here to shop? Or to sell something?

list.name: Neml
list.text: Um, I'm here to buy food......

list.name: Trader
list.text:
I see.
Then I'm the opposite.
The man held out about ten strangely shaped fruits in his hands.

list.name: Trader
list.text:
They're called Kasra fruit.
They're used as medicine ingredients.

list.name: Trader
list.text: They don't grow around here, so they sell for a high price.

list.if: カスラの実を買おうとする

list.name: Neml
list.text: (Come to think of it, Nina said "{ref:204}")

list.name: Neml
list.text: Hey, could you sell me one of those Kasra fruits?

list.name: Trader
list.text: Uh, these are ingredients for a Tranquilizer, though......

list.name: Trader
list.text: If you need medicine, it's cheaper to buy a prepared one at the apothecary.

list.name: Trader
list.text: One of these can make a lot, so they're pretty expensive.

list.if: カスラの実を買おうとしない

list.name: Trader
list.text: Oh, looks like it's my turn.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: Hey, haven't seen you around, pal.
He took out one Kasra fruit from a cloth bag and showed it to the shopkeeper.

list.name: Trader
list.text:
I brought ten.
Can you buy them all?
The man and the shopkeeper exchanged the bag of Kasra fruit for a pile of coins.
The shopkeeper emptied the bag onto the counter.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: Half of these are just walnuts.
On the counter, there are indeed five Kasra fruits and five ordinary walnuts.

list.name: Trader
list.text: I brought ten Kasra fruits, nothing else.

list.name: Trader
list.text:
Hey,
I did show you ten Kasra fruits, right?

list.if: ボロがカスラの実を吐き出さない
行商を助ける

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Yeah,
I think you showed me about ten fruits with that same shape.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text:
What are you talking about?
Then where are the rest?

list.name: Trader
list.text: You swapped them with walnuts and hid them.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: You just say whatever you want.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: We'll have that guard over there check the stall.
After hearing the situation, the guard searched the stall thoroughly.

list.name: Trader
list.text: There has to be some other wrongdoing!

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text:
That shorty is in on it too.
Never seen her around.

list.name: Trader
list.text: She's not involved! I just met her.

list.name: Guard
list.text: You two are sentenced to prison.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text:
Heh.
Hey, leave the money you swindled too.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Um...... I have nothing to do with this.

list.name: Guard
list.text: I haven't seen you around here.

list.name: Guard
list.text: Do you have anything to prove your identity?

list.name: Neml
list.text: {red}(Something to prove my identity...... do I have anything?)

list.if: 身分を証明できない

list.name: Neml
list.text: (What do I do, I didn't bring anything from home......)

list.if: 身分を証明できる

list.name: Neml
list.text: This is a tax payment certificate.

list.name: Guard
list.text: Hmm, you do seem to live nearby.

list.name: Guard
list.text: It's unlikely you're in cahoots with this outsider.

list.if: 行商を助けない

list.name: Neml
list.text: I'm sorry, I don't really know......

list.name: Trader
list.text:
Alright, let's do this.
I'll call the guard over there.

list.name: Trader
list.text: If he searches the stall, he'll find the Kasra fruit you hid.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text:
Yeah, sounds good.
Let's do it.
After hearing the situation, the guard searched the stall thoroughly.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text:
Heh.
Hey, leave the money you swindled too.

list.if: 行商だけ捕まる

list.text: The man was led away by the guard.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: Tch, this is why you can't trust outsiders.
Neml bought some ingredients at the stall.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I'm glad I wasn't dragged into it...... I think......

list.name: Neml
list.text: Anyway, next I'll head to the apothecary.

list.if: ボロがカスラの実を吐き出す

list.text: As Neml hesitated, Bolo at the storefront reacted to her.
Bolo pressed his nose to Neml's bag and sniffed.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Ah, do you want the baguette?
When Neml offered a piece of baguette to Bolo, a Kasra fruit fell from his mouth as he tried to eat it.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: W-what the...... Bolo, you mutt, were you hiding it? Haha.

list.name: Trader
list.text: You tried to use this dog to scam me.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: He must have mistaken them for treats and picked them up.

list.name: Trader
list.text: I'm glad my name is cleared, but......

list.name: Trader
list.text: Sorry, but I'm calling the guard.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text:
Let's do this.
I'll return all ten Kasra fruits.

list.name: Shopkeeper
list.text: And keep the payment I gave you.

list.name: Trader
list.text: I'll let it go this time, but don't do this to anyone again.
The Kasra fruits were returned to the trader.

list.name: Trader
list.text: Hey, this is a thank-you. Take it.

list.name: Trader
list.text: Like I said, these are Kasra fruits, they're valuable.

list.name: Trader
list.text: No, without you I might've been in trouble.

Neml received the Kasra fruit!
It's a little damp from Bolo's drool......

list.name: Neml
list.text: So the market can be like that......

list.name: Neml
list.text: But I bought food, so next I'll head to the apothecary.

list.name: Neml
list.text: The Nightmare suppressant, and, um, the Tranquilizer as well......

list.name: Doctor
list.text:
Ah, you ran out.
That's rough.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: I'll get them ready right away.

list.name: Neml
list.text: You're kind to us even though you know we're Noctarian.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Even if your nightmares cause disasters, it's not because you want them to.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Besides, I'd be in trouble if you didn't take your Nightmare suppressant properly.
As he said that, the doctor took a medicine bottle from the shelf.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Sorry, I have the Nightmare suppressant, but I'm out of Tranquilizer.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Would it be okay to get that one another time?

list.name: Neml
list.text: Oh, yeah, that one doesn't have to be today.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: I could make it if I had the ingredients.

list.if: 精神安定剤の材料を渡す

list.name: Neml
list.text: (Come to think of it, Nina said "{ref:302}")
Neml showed the doctor the Kasra fruit.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Oh, you did well to get that.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Yes, that's it. I can make it with Kasra fruit.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Then I'll make the medicine in exchange for the ingredients, okay?
Neml received the Nightmare suppressant and the Tranquilizer.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Come back before you run out next time.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Take care on your way home.

list.if: 精神安定剤の材料を渡さない

list.text: The doctor showed Neml a colorfully glowing medicine.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: This is a little different from your usual medicine.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: If you take it, you'll feel really good.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: You'll relax and forget all the bad things.

list.name: Doctor
list.text:
Yeah.
If you want, why not try a little?

list.name: Doctor
list.text: You can pay if you like it.

list.name: Neml
list.text: {red}(I don't know this medicine, but maybe I can try it......?)

list.if: カラフルな薬を飲む

list.text: Neml drank the colorful medicine the doctor handed her.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: That's right, you can sit in this chair.

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Then you can lie down in this room.

list.if: カラフルな薬を飲まない

list.name: Doctor
list.text: Let me know if you change your mind.
Neml paid for the Nightmare suppressant and left the apothecary.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I'm a bit tired from walking outside for the first time in a while.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I'll rest a little before heading back.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Yeah, I got a little tired from walking.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: The moon looks even bigger today.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Yeah.
It keeps getting bigger every day.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Today it feels like it might fall any moment.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text:
Everyone talks about it,
but no one seems to know.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: I often watch the sea here,

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: and the moonlight makes it look much brighter than before.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Have you ever been beyond the sea?

list.name: Neml
list.text:
It's so far away......
I don't think I'll ever go.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Would you go by ship, maybe......?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: it would be hard for ordinary people, I think.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: I wish I could fly there.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I don't think that's possible, though......

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: People long ago could, it seems.

list.name: Neml
list.text: There were people who could use magic, right?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: You could fly to meet someone who's gone far away.
The woman showed Neml an old compass.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: It's a magical tool from long ago.

list.name: Neml
list.text: It's different from a normal compass?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: It doesn't point north, it points toward the one the owner loves.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: My lover gave it to me.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: He had to go far away for a while,

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: so I'd still know where he was...... that's why he gave it to me.

list.name: Neml
list.text: That's why you wanted to go beyond the sea.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: But I think it's too late now.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: For a while, the needle moved a little each day,

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: and seeing that made me feel he was doing his best beyond the sea......

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: It made me want to keep going too.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Not even a little...... it doesn't move anymore......
The woman sadly shook her head.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text:
It's not the compass that stopped moving......
I think it's him.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Sorry for talking about something so dark.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Do you want to hold hands with them,

list.name: Neml
list.text: I don't think Nina feels that way.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I think she cares about me, but......

list.name: Neml
list.text: That's because I'm unreliable, and she feels sorry for me......

list.if: お姉さんに精神安定剤をあげない

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Yeah, because you feel they're special, right?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Even when you're together, your hearts don't meet.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: If someone is alone anyway, maybe they don't need to be in this world......

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Then let's step into the sea, just a little.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: It's okay, when you dip your feet in it's chilly and feels nice.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Yeah, the cold waves brush your feet again and again, and your heart starts to feel calm.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: I'll hold your hand tight, so it's okay.
Smiling, the woman held out her hand to Neml.

list.name: Neml
list.text: {red}(I'm a little scared, but maybe I'll try.)

list.if: お姉さんと海に入らない

list.name: Ceryth
list.text:
Huh, why?
It feels really nice, you know.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Hmm,
but I'm going to pass.

list.name: Neml
list.text: And I have to head home.
When she turned back, no one was on the shore.

list.if: お姉さんと海に入る

list.text: The woman stepped into the sea, holding Neml's hand.
The seawater pushed against Neml's feet more strongly.

list.name: Neml
list.text: It might be a little scary.
The woman pulled Neml's wrist hard and went deeper.

list.if: お姉さんに精神安定剤をあげる

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: By the way, did you go to the apothecary?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: That's the medicine Noctarians take, right?

list.name: Neml
list.text: I usually try not to tell people.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: When Noctarians have nightmares, they become reality, right?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: By the way, is that a Tranquilizer?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: I wanted to buy one today, but they said it was sold out.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Oh, this......
I happened to have the ingredients, so he made it for me.

list.name: Neml
list.text: If you want, I can share some.
Neml poured half the medicine into the empty bottle the woman had.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Just knowing I have this makes me feel calmer.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Even if I take this, it doesn't truly solve anything, but

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: it gives me more time until it's solved.
The woman offered the magic compass.

list.name: Neml
list.text: But it's important to you, right?

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: It was, but I feel you're the one who needs it now.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: And seeing the needle not move makes me sad......

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Is the needle pointing at something?

list.name: Neml
list.text: It seems to be pointing in a different direction now.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: I'd be happy if it helps you.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Yeah,
I can kind of feel Nina's presence...... it's nice.

list.name: Ceryth
list.text: Well, I should be going soon.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Oh, yeah,
I'll head back too.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.name: Neml
list.text: It took quite a while, so maybe he went home already.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Since I bought food,
I guess I'll eat.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Eating alone feels kind of lonely.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I wonder if Nina is doing well.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.text: Knocking at the front door echoed through the room.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Oh, Rybel,
I'll open it now.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: You don't have to open it.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: I just stopped by to check on you.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: So you don't have to open it.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Just living with Nina makes me happy.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
Ah, sorry.
Maybe tomorrow or the day after.
Rybel knocked on the front door.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Oh, Rybel,
I'll open it now.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: You don't have to open it.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: I just stopped by to check on you.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: So you don't have to open it.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
Hey,
are you sure you don't want to tell her?

list.name: Nina
list.text:
Yeah,
......I can't tell her something like this.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Just living with Nina makes me happy.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
Ah, sorry.
Maybe tomorrow or the day after.

list.name: Rybel
list.text: Was this the right thing to do?

list.name: Nina
list.text:
Yeah,
I'm glad I got to hear her voice one last time.

list.name: Rybel
list.text:
......Hey,
Is there really no choice but for you to die?

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.text: A child's crying can be heard outside.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
There was that robber,
and Rybel was acting strange earlier, too.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I'm scared I'll get dragged into something again......

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Hmm,
leaving it alone isn't right.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
A child is crying alone,
and it doesn't look like anything else is there......
In the square in front of the house, a child is sitting and crying.

list.name: Korrin
list.text:
I got separated from everyone, and before I knew it I was left behind......
Ugh...... ueh......

list.name: Neml
list.text: Korrin, do you know where your home is?

list.name: Korrin
list.text:
It's toward the mountains,
......it's far, I can't get back alone......

list.name: Neml
list.text: (He looks like a Chaotix...... I'd rather not get involved, but......)
Korrin, who has stopped crying, is walking cheerfully through the forest.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Why did you come all this way?

list.name: Korrin
list.text: He beats bad guys and gets paid.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: Yeah, Dad says there are lots of bad guys in the world.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: Like people who hog all the money and food.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: They make things from scary dream worlds happen in the real world.

list.name: Korrin
list.text:
Because of that, there was a huge flood long ago, our country got washed away,
and my grandpa and grandma died too.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: That's why my dad hates those witches.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: If he finds them, he'll definitely take them down.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: Dad probably went home first because I didn't wait by the wagon......

list.name: Neml
list.text: He must be worried, so let's hurry.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: Dad's probably making dinner, so eat with us as thanks!

list.argument: ウルフリックの家:デフォルト
ウルフリックの家:デフォルト

list.name: Korrin
list.text: It's so quick when we use Dad's wagon.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: I thought I'd see him when we got back......

list.name: Korrin
list.text:
Sorry, Miss.
Looks like I can't treat you to a meal.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I need to get home too.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Will you be okay on your own?

list.name: Korrin
list.text:
Yeah.
Dad will come back later.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Even if he is......
I didn't have a choice...... right?

list.name: Neml
list.text: I wonder if Nina will be back when I get home.

list.argument: ウルフリックの家:デフォルト

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: You weren't on the wagon, were you?

list.name: Korrin
list.text:
Right! Dad, got food?
Let's treat her as thanks!

list.name: Neml
list.text: I have to get back soon.

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: Tell you what, I'll send the wagon back, so take that home.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Ah! It's fine! I'll do it myself.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: Is this all your stuff, Miss?

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: Korrin, that's enough. Go back to your room.

list.name: Korrin
list.text: Miss, come hang out again anytime!
Wulfric held out a small leather pouch filled with coins to Neml.

list.name: Wulfric
list.text: It's what I took from you earlier, and thanks for bringing Korrin home.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
I'm tired,
maybe I'll sleep until I get home.

list.if: バッドエンド

list.name: Neml
list.text: Will Nina be home when I get back?

list.name: Neml
list.text:
......No
Thinking sad thoughts gives me bad dreams.

list.if: ノーマルエンド

list.name: Neml
list.text: I wonder what Nina thinks about what I talked about with that woman on the beach......

list.name: Neml
list.text: Is this just my own feeling?

list.name: Neml
list.text: {red}If Nina felt the same way about me......

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Surely there won't be any nightmares,
and I'll be able to have happy dreams every day.

list.if: グッドエンド

list.name: Neml
list.text: What Nina wrote in her letter......

list.name: Neml
list.text:
If I fall asleep like this,
I'm sure I'll have a very happy dream.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Such a happy dream...... for the first time.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: As you know, this is the fate of you Noctarians.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: {red}When you have nightmares, they become calamities in reality.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: A major example was shortly before you were born.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: A nightmare seen by a Noctarian caused a great flood across the world.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: Many died, and many were driven from their homes.

list.name: Shaman
list.text:
Most of the regions where the Chaotix lived were washed away,
and their fate afterward changed greatly.

list.name: Nina
list.text: Why do we have to bear this fate?

list.name: Shaman
list.text: The world evolves when great changes occur.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: For that, there must be something that brings about those great shifts.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: You are part of how this world works.

list.name: Nina
list.text: But what if the world is destroyed because of it?

list.name: Shaman
list.text: That, too, is the world's choice.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: Our current civilization is not the first in this world.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: And it will not be the last.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: The end of civilization is merely another great shift.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: Now, what kind of nightmare did you see?

list.name: Nina
list.text:
A dream where the moon......
falls.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: So the moon's approach was your influence after all.

list.name: Nina
list.text: When will this dream come true?

list.name: Shaman
list.text: The day after you saw it.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: In other words, the world may end tonight.

list.name: Nina
list.text: Is there a way to stop it from happening?

list.name: Shaman
list.text: If the Noctarian who saw the nightmare dies, the nightmare will not be realized.

list.name: Nina
list.text: So if I give up my own life, the nightmare won't become reality?

list.name: Nina
list.text: Does that go against the order of this world?

list.name: Shaman
list.text: That, too, is one of the world's choices.

list.name: Shaman
list.text:
We are a people of tradition.
We neither deny nor affirm your choice.

list.name: Shaman
list.text: We only witness and pass on the choices of this world.

list.if: 悪夢予防薬を片付けない

list.name: ネムル
list.text: どこに行っちゃったんだろう

list.name: ネムル
list.text: いつ、帰ってくるんだろう
Neml looked up at the sky outside the window.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Somehow, the moon that felt so close now seems far away.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
It's almost dawn......
What really happened?

list.name: Neml
list.text:
The compass I got from that woman......
I'll use it to look for Nina.

list.name: Neml
list.text: It looks like Nina is around here.

list.name: Neml
list.text: This should be near Shamani's Tower.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Why would Nina be in a place like this?
Neml found Nina, changed beyond recognition.

title: 再会

list.name: Neml
list.text: Thanks to the wagon ride, I got back pretty quickly.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
The compass I got from that woman......
I'll use it to look for Nina.

list.name: Neml
list.text: This should be the forest leading to Shamani's Tower......

list.name: Neml
list.text: Why would Nina be in a place like this?

list.name: Nina
list.text: How did you find this place?

list.name: Nina
list.text: A dream where the moon falls.

list.name: Nina
list.text: If I'm gone, the nightmare won't come true.

if: 生きてニーナに会える

list.name: Neml
list.text: There's no way I can accept you being gone......

list.name: Nina
list.text: What am I supposed to do......? I......

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Let's go home.
Together, to our home.

list.name: Neml
list.text: I don't want a world that goes on with only you gone.

list.name: Neml
list.text: A world like that...... shouldn't exist.

list.name: Neml
list.text: If I'm going to die, I want it to be with you.

list.name: Nina
list.text: The moon's getting really close, isn't it?

list.name: Nina
list.text:
When we get home......
there's something I want to tell you, Neml.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
It's almost......
the end, isn't it?

list.name: Nina
list.text:
Hey, Neml......
Will you hold my hand......?

list.name: Neml
list.text: Hey, what was it you wanted to tell me earlier?

list.name: Neml
list.text: Come on, I want to hear it.

list.name: Nina
list.text: It's pathetic that I can't say it when it's almost over.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Yeah.
I'm glad I found you, Nina.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Thank you for staying with me until the end.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
What you told me......
it made me so happy.

list.name: Nina
list.text: Once I faced my true feelings, I made my decision.

list.name: Nina
list.text: I still want you to live.

As Neml ran after Nina, who had leapt,
large shining wings spread from her back.

list.name: Neml
list.text: Nina, you don't have to do this anymore.

list.name: Neml
list.text: A dream where this world keeps going.

list.name: Neml
list.text: The dream that will come true is mine.

list.name: Neml
list.text:
Yeah.
Look, I can even fly now.

list.name: Neml
list.text: What you told me made me so happy.

list.name: Neml
list.text: So happy it brought a miracle like this.
